title: Did the remains found on the mountain? Kilimanjaro parallel to a Bible story?
subtitle: The story of Joseph tells the story of a brother who was rejected by his relatives and then rose to a desired date by Pharaoh Egypt.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The remains discovered in Mount Klimanjaro provide evidence in support of Joseph's story, a Bible passage about the drought that occurred in Egypt some 4,000 years ago.
